mapper.insert: insert into Cart(bookNo, qty, userId) values(#{bookNo}, #{qty}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.price, b.salePrice, c.qty, m.userId, d.cRate FROM Cart c INNER JOIN BookList b ON c.bookNo = b.bookNo INNER JOIN Member m ON c.userId = m.userId INNER JOIN ClassDef d ON m.userTotalPay BETWEEN d.minStandard AND d.maxStandard WHERE c.userId = 'gayoon';
